thread.title: Girl band? Megan McKenna, Chloe Sims, Georgia Kousoulou and Amber Turner get glammed up for dinner in Tenerife
thread.title_full: Girl band? Megan McKenna, Chloe Sims, Georgia Kousoulou and Amber Turner get glammed up for dinner in Tenerife

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Girl band? Megan McKenna, Chloe Sims, Georgia Kousoulou and Amber Turner get glammed up for dinner in Tenerife
text:
Girl band? Megan McKenna, Chloe Sims, Georgia Kousoulou and Amber Turner get glammed up for dinner in Tenerife The ITVBe series began filming the 20th season of the reality show on Monday Share Megan McKenna, Chloe Sims, Georgia Kousoulou & Amber Turner (Photo: Rex Features) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Megan McKenna, Chloe Sims, Georgia Kousoulou and Amber Turner could have been mistaken for a girl group when they stepped out in Tenerife on Monday. 
The TOWIE gals all dressed to impress in a variety of sexy ensembles before posing for snaps outside their hotel. 
Looking the most conservative, Megan opted to wear leather trousers, a print silk shirt and cream skyhigh heels. 
And Chloe looked like she'd raided Kim Kardashian's wardrobe in a ripped light green T-shirt, green cycling shorts and perspex boots. Chloe Sims & Georgia Kousoulou (Photo: Rex Features) Georgia Kousoulou (Photo: Rex Features) 
While Georgia dressed in camouflage trousers and a white crop trop, and Megan's pal and TOWIE newcomer Amber was showing off her seriously deep glow in an oversized T-shirt. Megan McKenna & Amber Turner (Photo: Rex Features) Chloe Sims, Tommy Mallet & Georgia Kousoulou (Photo: Rex Features) 
While earlier in the day, Chloe and Georgia were spotted flashing the flesh in their bikinis. 
Georgia wore a revealing red high-cut bikini with pink lip prints, and accessorised with a large gold necklace sat in her cleavage. She showed off her bum for the camera, then covered up with a red floaty full-length cardigan. Chloe Sims (Photo: Rex Features) Amber Turner (Photo: Rex Features) Peter Wicks, Gatsby & James Locke (Photo: Rex Features) 
Chloe looked Chloe looked fiery in red too, wearing a red smock over her bikini with some heeled sandals. 
And Earlier in the day, Megan and bff Amber were spotted strutting their stuff on the Spanish island in far less clothes. The Only Way Is Going To Tenerife And Getting Your Bikini On (Photo: Rex Features) Georgia looked strong and toned in her bikini (Photo: Rex Features) Georgia had been working on her abs (Photo: Rex Features) Read More 
The girls displayed their gorgeous figures as they made their way to meet up with the rest of the cast. 
Brunette beauty Megan, 24, showed off her endless pins and toned tummy in a tiny floral two-piece. Georgia put on this floaty gown over her bikini (Photo: Rex Features) Chloe was happily posing in the Tenerife sunshine (Photo: Rex Features) Chloe covered up in her kaftan (Photo: Rex Features) 
She completed her look by wrapping a black sarong around her waist and letting her long tresses hang loose around her shoulders. 
Blonde babe Amber has joined her BFF Megan on The Only Way Is Essex for the first time. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
